alert.note: Alert for Niobrara County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 04 at 1:49PM MST until March 05 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Nebraska Panhandle along the Pine Ridge to Lusk in Niobrara County. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 8 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous travel conditions possible due to icy, snow packed roads and reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
